author: Lon.TV
description:
Find one at Heltec: https://lon.tv/gjcq4 and use code wxwc8hd3 for 10% off (affiliate link). In the US you need the 902-928mhz version. Heltec put together an out of the box Meshtastic radio that doubles as a Qi 2 wireless charger! See my original Meshtastic video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GS2OgeiK_2s and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:43 - Supporter thank yous
01:20 - Pricing for the Heltec Meshpocket
01:36 - Hardware overview
03:41 - Ports and Meshtastic Battery life
04:37 - Firmware updates
05:38 - Demo
07:26 - LoRa Radio Specs
07:59 - New York City Meshtastic Experience!
10:39 - Conclusion

title: Out of the Box Meshtastic! Heltec Pocket Mesh Powerbank & My NYC Mesh Experience!
